name: FederatedIdentity-DevContainer
postCreateCommand:
/bin/bash -lc '
  set -euo pipefail
  echo "[postCreate] Starting setup…"

  # --- Ensure GitHub CLI is available ---
  if ! command -v gh >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo "[postCreate] Installing GitHub CLI…"
    sudo apt-get update -y && sudo apt-get install -y gh || true
  fi
  gh --version || true

  # --- Auth with GitHub if not already ---
  if ! gh auth status >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo "[postCreate] Logging into GitHub CLI…"
    gh auth login --web || true
  fi

  # --- Ensure Foundry (forge/cast) is available ---
  if ! command -v forge >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo "[postCreate] Installing Foundry…"
    curl -L https://foundry.paradigm.xyz | bash
    ~/.foundry/bin/foundryup
    sudo install -m 0755 ~/.foundry/bin/forge /usr/local/bin/forge
    sudo install -m 0755 ~/.foundry/bin/cast  /usr/local/bin/cast
  fi

  # --- Ensure Besu (best-effort; do not fail container) ---
  if ! command -v besu >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo "[postCreate] Installing Besu (best-effort)…"
    if command -v install-besu >/dev/null 2>&1; then
      install-besu 24.10.1 || true
    else
      echo "[postCreate] install-besu helper not found; skipping Besu install"
    fi
  fi

  # --- Run environment verifier if present ---
  if [ -x ./scripts/verify-env.sh ]; then
    echo "[postCreate] Running scripts/verify-env.sh…"
    ./scripts/verify-env.sh || true
  else
    echo "[postCreate] (info) scripts/verify-env.sh not found; skipping"
  fi

  # --- Print versions summary ---
  echo "[postCreate] Versions:"
  node -v   || true
  npm -v    || true
  forge --version || true
  cast --version  || true
  besu --version  || true
  gh auth status  || true
  echo "[postCreate] Done."
'
